body:
## What is this?
bla die bla
![Tux at Work](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8232/8364469834_8b187cfdcc_n.jpg)
## Requirements
* Raspberry Pi
* I2C enabled LCD Display
* 2 two color led's (red/green)
* 2 BC547B transistors
* 4 4k7 Resistors
* 4 220E Resistors
* Connector or Raspberry IO (2x13 pins)
* wire
* bread board

## Installation instructions
* Install Raspian hard float image from here [Raspian "Wheezy"](http://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads)
* Install java 1.8 preview from here [java 1.8 preview with javafx and hardfloat support](http://jdk7.java.net/fxarmpreview/)
* Install [tomcat 7](http://tomcat.apache.org) 
* Enable I2C instructions here [enabling-i2c-on-raspberry-pi](http://donalmorrissey.blogspot.nl/2012/09/enabling-i2c-on-raspberry-pi.html)
* Clone this repository, build with maven
* deploy war to tomcat


## Electronics Schematic :

name: Pitux
